info.author: MTA contributors (github.com/multitheftauto/mtasa-resources)
info.description: Launches a basic freeroam mode, together with basic map and extra handling

setting.name: *playerRespawnTime
setting.desc: Player respawn time after dying in milliseconds. Anything below 0 is auto-set to 0

setting.name: *vehicleRespawnTime
setting.desc: Vehicle respawn time after it is taken. Anything below 0 is auto-set to 0

setting.name: *vehicleExpireTime
setting.desc: Vehicle disappear time after abandoned, timer resets if any player re-enters the vehicle. Anything below 0 is auto-set to 0
